name: emoji-kitchen
title: Emoji Kitchen
description: Combine two emojis into creative mashups powered by Google's Emoji Kitchen. Quickly search, mix, and copy unique emoji combinations
author: kevintraver

commands.name: mix-emojis
commands.title: Mix Two Emojis
commands.subtitle: Emoji Kitchen
commands.description: Manually select two emojis to create a mashup

commands.name: describe-mashup
commands.title: Describe Emoji Mashup
commands.subtitle: Emoji Kitchen
commands.description: Use AI to find emoji combinations from descriptions

commands.name: refresh-metadata
commands.title: Refresh Emoji Metadata
commands.subtitle: Emoji Kitchen
commands.description: Download latest emoji combinations from GitHub

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
